scheduler

Class TimePoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.TimePoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<TimePoint>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StartTimePoint, StopTimePoint

    public abstract class TimePoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<TimePoint>
    This class can be used to schedule appointments. It is either a start- or a stop point. Useful for finding free appointments.

      static java.util.Comparator<TimePoint> ComparatorsStartFirst

      • isBetweenExcluding

        public boolean isBetweenExcluding(TimePoint before,
                         TimePoint after)
        Checks wether this timepoint lies between the two other timepoints.
        Parameters:
        timePoint - The timepoint that has to lie between the other two timepoints
        before - The timepoint that has to lie before the first timepoint
        after - The timepoint that has to lie behind the first timepoint
        Returns:
        True if the first timepoint lies between the other two timepoints

      • isBetweenExcludingEndPoint

        public boolean isBetweenExcludingEndPoint(TimePoint before,
                                 TimePoint after)
        Checks wether this timepoint lies between the two other timepoints, including the first point, but excluding the last point.
        Parameters:
        timePoint - The timepoint that has to lie between the other two timepoints
        before - The timepoint that has to lie before or on the first timepoint
        after - The timepoint that has to lie behind the first timepoint
        Returns:
        True if the first timepoint lies between the other two timepoints or on the first point
